column4: what is the key equilivant for ctrl alt del (to end a non-responsive full screen program)?
in terminal killall [app name] or killall -9 [app name]
yep i knew about kill/killall but what about if im in a game thats full screen and non-responsive (ie it froze up)
I would use ctrl+alt+f[1-6] to move to a tty than log in and kill it from their, I had to do that before due to system being unresponsive
